column4: Is there a browser in linux where FLASH wont make my browsing experience all CHOPPY?
Is there a browser in linux where FLASH wont make my browsing experience all CHOPPY?
did you sudo apt-get install it?
did you type this:: " sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree" ?
ahh i thiougfht so, thats why I said, did you try  sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree
sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree works perfect for me
try this anyway...  sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree
go to a flash testting website?
never ever install anythging outside the repos, unless you have made a image first using something like Acronis Trueimage
learn from the experience and reinstall ubuntu?
I only did this and flash works:  sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree
